column4: where can i find how to set up my linux to linux network? all i can seam to find is how to do linux to windows
what kind of "network" you want ? file sharing ?
yes for now want to be able to share files
you can use NFS, although I never tried to learn it... what I commonly use (and this is not "The Right Way", I guess) is to configure ssh and use sshfs on both
